global.defaultTitle: ACHI Digital — Professional Website Development & Digital Agency
global.defaultDescription: ACHI Digital is a full-service digital agency providing professional website development, custom website services, SEO-friendly web design, and performance-driven digital solutions for businesses.

home.title: Website Development & Digital Agency — Websites That Drive Business Growth
home.description: ACHI Digital is a modern digital agency specializing in professional website development, custom website services, and conversion-focused web design. We build fast, SEO-friendly, scalable websites that generate leads, sales, and long-term ROI.

index.title: Website Development Services & Digital Solutions
index.description: Explore our professional website development services, including custom website design, full-stack web development, SEO-friendly websites, performance optimization, and AI-ready digital solutions.

websiteDevelopment.title: Custom Website Development Services
websiteDevelopment.description: Professional custom website development services designed to build fast, secure, scalable, and SEO-friendly websites tailored to your business goals.

webDesign.title: Website Design & UI/UX Services
webDesign.description: High-end website design and UI/UX services focused on user experience, conversion optimization, and modern, professional business websites.

seo.title: SEO Services & SEO-Friendly Website Development
seo.description: Technical SEO services, SEO-friendly website structure, and optimization strategies designed to improve search rankings, visibility, and long-term organic growth.

ai.title: AI-Powered Website Development
ai.description: AI-powered website development services including intelligent personalization, AI-driven UX optimization, and future-ready digital platforms built with SEO-safe architecture.

about.title: About ACHI Digital — Professional Web Development Agency
about.description: Learn about ACHI Digital, a trusted digital agency specializing in professional website development, modern web design, SEO-first architecture, and performance-driven digital solutions.

index.title: Web Development, SEO & Digital Growth Insights
index.description: Insights and articles on website development, SEO, performance optimization, AI-powered websites, conversion-focused UX, and modern digital growth strategies.

careers.title: Careers — Join Our Digital Agency
careers.description: Explore career opportunities at ACHI Digital and join a modern digital agency building professional, high-performance, SEO-first websites and digital platforms.

contact.title: Contact Us — Get a Professional Website Built
contact.description: Contact ACHI Digital to get a professional website built. Request a quote, discuss your project, or schedule a strategy call with our web development experts.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Read ACHI Digital’s privacy policy explaining how we collect, use, and protect personal data in compliance with privacy and data protection regulations.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: Learn how ACHI Digital uses cookies and similar technologies to improve website performance, user experience, and analytics.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Review the terms and conditions governing the use of ACHI Digital’s website and professional digital services.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.description: ACHI Digital is committed to providing an accessible website experience for all users, following accessibility best practices and standards.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for could not be found. Explore our website development services or return to the homepage.
